label: MQTT Publisher - Individual Global Nodes
info:
Publishes each global variable to separate MQTT topic.

Pattern:
- Read: global.get('{variable_name}', 'localFile')
- Publish: emon/{variable_name}

Trigger: Every 2 seconds
Broker: 5ce17770.7dd328
